name: Pixel Town - Tap to Hop Ahead
name_original: Pixel Town - Tap to Hop Ahead
description:
This is a challenging jet fun and addictive endless jumping game where you have to jump on moving blocks. With your hopping skills, unlock new awesome characters with the coins you collect on the way.

HOW TO PLAY:

Just tap on the screen to jump. Looks easy? Just try it out and challenge your friends and yourself in this endless hop game!

FEATURES:

- User friendly and smooth controls
- Endless mode
- Unlock new characters with the coins you collect !
- IAP to remove Ads
- One tap gameplay


Download it today for free and enjoy as it’s great fun for all ages!
